roleset.name: to put in a wrong place

example.name: passive
example.text: The air - waybill number was changed en route , and paper work showing that the crates had cleared customs was misplaced , so it was a week before three of the four crates could be located in a bonded warehouse and the Gauguin discovered missing .

propbank.arg: paper work showing that the crates had cleared customs

roleset.note: MISPLACE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'misplace' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from misplace.01-v predicate notes)
